diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Factor H deficiency associated with atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome (HUS) and/or membranoproliferative glomerulonephritis (MPGN)
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis of Factor H deficiency was based on laboratory investigations showing low or undetectable levels of factor H protein, and the presence of clinical features indicative of HUS or MPGN in the patients. Genetic analysis confirmed mutations in the FH gene that correlated with the observed deficiencies.
